name: Sharpsign B

sections.text:
#Brational reads rational in binary (radix 2).  For example,
      #B1101 == 13 ;1101_2
      #b101/11 == 5/3
The consequences are undefined if the token immediately following the #B
does not have the syntax of a binary (i.e., radix 2) rational.
